titles.title: The Way I Want to Live

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Keep my eyes fixed on you And my heart longing for you As I grasp more of you Yielding and surrender my ways to You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To only let my spirit Reverence all the way through To only let my spirit Reverence all the way through{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Accomplishing with zeal to honor and Worship you Accomplishing with zeal to honor and Follow you{/lang-eng}
